title: Editor’s pick: Were the suffragettes terrorists?
itunes:title: Editor’s pick: Were the suffragettes terrorists?
itunes:subtitle: Fern Riddell explores some of the darker aspects of the campaign for votes for women, in this episode from our archive
description:
In this archive episode, historian Fern Riddell discusses her biography of suffrage campaigner Kitty Marion, which explores some of the darker aspects of the campaign for votes for women.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
